items.text: slants a length ball across, punched to extra cover.
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Williams, no run

items.text: skiddy bouncer just outside leg, Williams is looking to pull but is hurried into the stroke, ends up ducking under.
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Williams, no run

items.text: deadbats this length delivery on middle, for a second, he didn't know where this rolled through
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Williams, no run

items.text: works this across the line towards long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: nice flight, lands it just around off, defended back to the bowler.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williams, no run

items.text: drifts in to roll off a thick inside edge towards mid-on, was looking to play straight.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williams, 1 run

items.text: sharp turn from middle and leg, worked into the gap between square leg and short fine
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: makes room and punches this towards sweeper cover as they jog the single
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williams, 1 run

items.text: worked with the spin towards deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, 1 run

items.preText: Breaking news: Chief selector Minhajul Abedin has told ESPNcricinfo that they have included Soumya Sarkar in the squad for the third ODI."
items.text: slips a length ball into middle and leg, tucked to fine leg.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, 1 run

items.preText: Ashwani Sharma: "Last wonderful innings from Taylor I remember is his century against India in 2015 world cup. Hoping something similar today as well."
items.text: Nearly chopped on! Drives a delivery that veers in from round the stumps, thick inside edge towards fine leg.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williams, 2 runs

items.text: floats this full and across the left-hander, eased to sweeper cover.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williams, 1 run

items.text: slower and fuller delivery angling into middle and leg, worked gently towards deep square leg.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: once again a drive, but there's not much room. Gets a thick inside edge to short midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williams, no run

items.text: stands tall and punches this on the up to mid-off where there's a misfield, so they'll get a run.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williams, 1 run

items.text: makes room and eases it with the spin to cover.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williams, no run

items.text: punches this straight to the cover fielder.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williams, no run

items.text: slider that skids back in towards middle, he makes room and cuts to deep cover. Dangerous, because he's a prime candidate to be lbw or bowled if he misses from there.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williams, 1 run

items.text: flatter one on middle and leg, whipped to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: Just past slip! goes back to cut but this skids through to take a thick outside edge, short third man runs back to cut that off. Streaky runs but valuable runs
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williams, 2 runs

items.text: makes room an punches this skiddy delivery to deep cover again. Sensible stuff.
items.postText: It's time for a drinks break. Out come the dry fruits, bananas, energy drinks and ice-cold water.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williams, 1 run

items.preText:
Tuhin has spotted a small chink: "Taylor does not look comfortable against left-arm-spin. Don't know why Mashrafe hasn't brought Apu into the attack yet."

Mashrafe to continue, from round the wicket
items.text: slants a length ball into the stumps, defended back
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williams, no run

items.text: gentle dab into the gap between cover and point for a quick single.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williams, 1 run

items.text: slips a length delivery down leg, tickled to fine leg.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: slower and fuller on middle and off, driven forcefully to mid-off as they scamper a single
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williams, 1 run
